# 36th Golden Bell Awards

The 36th Golden Bell Awards (Mandarin:第36屆金鐘獎) was held on September 28, 2001 at the Sun Yat-sen Memorial Hall, Taipei, Taiwan. The ceremony was broadcast live by TTV.
